column4: today for some reason ubuntu has been freezing but not for a long time only for like a brief 2-5 seconds and im trying 2 watch a movie but because of this its getting annoying
I noticed that as well when I installed the xgl server and turned on compiz. switched all that off and now it works fine. also preload (apt-get install preload) will help.
i just installed preload now wat do i do
- you need to check the guide for that mate http://ubuntuguide.org/wiki/Ubuntu:Gutsy
thx
- preload will help speed things up - just leave it along for now - it needs a little while to work out your usage patterns and start helping
- if you are using an ATI card like I am you are in for a lot of fun! :-)
no i am just using the standared on board graphics that came wit my dell :(
wow can u give me a place 2 start cause this guide is huge
- really? what card is on board? Seach the guide for 'compiz' (alt-f in firefox)
please help me ive been using windows for 8 years and ive only been using linux for 4 days i was told that i have 2 edit the xorg but i have no idea wats that and im confused please help me
- okay mate - create a channel and I'll join and help you out offline to save space here. :-)
how do i invite u to the channel i just created
- what's the channle name?
BlackChaos & WAKD xorg help
- can you just called it a single word - I can't seem to join..
XORG Help
just XORGHELP please mate :-)
oops seems to be taken
just create a channel called BlackChaos :-)
there BlackChaos is the name of the channel
